DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , And Effects On Histamine-Induced Wheal Of PF-05180999 In Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year No history clinicallyrelevant atopic dermatological disease Positive reaction intradermal injection histamine Subjects screen laboratory test result deviate upper and/or lower limit reference acceptable range . The exception liver function test must exceed upper limit normal . Subjects evidence , history , hepatic disorder , include acute chronic hepatitis B hepatitis C Intolerance intradermal histamine injection . Subjects dark skin ( Part B ) .
